channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二 "几乎所有举行共和党初选的州都取得了胜利，在这个夜晚，他几乎获得了该党的总统候选人提名，将在今年的白宫竞选中与乔-拜登（Joe Biden）对决：
item.description:
Donald Trump cruised to victory in nearly all of the states holding Republican primaries on Super Tuesday, on a night that took him to the brink of securing his party’s presidential nomination to face Joe Biden in this year’s White House race: https://t.co/Ub5S4fp1pr pic.twitter.com/M1wJLFPTE6

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 今天的预算案很可能是大选前的最后一次，因此政府将寄予厚望，希望它能有意义地改变公众舆论，使其对政府有利。但杰里米-亨特能做到吗？
item.description:
Today’s Budget is likely to be the last before a general election, so the government will have high hopes that it will meaningfully shift public opinion in its favour.

But can Jeremy Hunt deliver?https://t.co/BWvek95ORj pic.twitter.com/q41gTLdrqx

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 你是否想知道胡塞武装声称攻击 "英国"、"美国 "或 "以色列 "船只的说法有多准确？让我来向您介绍一下船只国籍的阴暗世界：
item.description:
Have you wondered how accurate the Houthis' claims to be attacking "British," "American" or "Israeli" ships are? Let me introduce you to the murky world of ships' nationalities: https://t.co/5SQApGRVyJ

— Robert Wright (@RKWinvisibleman) March 5, 2024

item.title: 观点唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二"（Super Tuesday）一举夺魁，但他吸引共和党选民的能力却明显低于预期。
item.description:
Opinion: Even as he romped to victory on Super Tuesday, Donald Trump has continued to show a striking ability to attract Republican voters at a significantly lower rate than anticipated https://t.co/CcUJfLbhLr pic.twitter.com/KrE3Na2tc1

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 我们对预算案了解多少？按照历史悠久的传统，今天的几项重要预算公告已经提前公布，从行业投资到养老金改革。点击此处了解更多信息：
item.description:
What do we know already about the Budget?

In time-honoured tradition, several of today’s important Budget announcements have been made ahead of time, from industry investment to pension reforms.

Find out more here: https://t.co/z2Jr2ec5hG pic.twitter.com/T38rVcpgvu

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）将在其预算案中提出 100 亿英镑的个人减税计划，同时还将废除殖民时代的 "非家庭 "制度。
item.description:
Chancellor Jeremy Hunt is set to put a £10bn personal tax cut at the heart of his Budget, which will also see him scrap the colonial-era 'non-dom' regime https://t.co/F4P0bSYnUM

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 英国广播公司（OBR）预测🔹🔹2 便士或非 2 便士🔹🔹支出🔹🔹其他资金🔹脱帽兔🔹杰里米-亨特公布 2024 年预算时的五大看点
item.description:
🔹OBR forecasts
🔹2p or not 2p
🔹Spending
🔹Other funding
🔹Rabbits out of hats

Five things to watch as Jeremy Hunt unveils the 2024 budget https://t.co/AhxlumCEDy

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: "一位西方情报官员说："猫捉老鼠的游戏又回来了。"另一位官员说："俄罗斯的活动与冷战时期一样多，甚至更多。"第三位官员说："俄罗斯情报部门是一个庞大的机器，它又开始做它一直在做的事情了。
item.description:
“The game of cat and mouse has returned,” said one western intelligence officer. “Russian activities  are as high or higher than during the cold war,” said another. “Russian intelligence is a huge machine and back doing what it always did,” said a third. https://t.co/mogEfWiPny

— max seddon (@maxseddon) March 6, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰贸易部长表示，乌克兰准备接受与欧盟的贸易限制，以化解与波兰的激烈政治争端，同时敦促欧盟禁止进口俄罗斯谷物。
item.description:
Ukraine is prepared to accept restrictions on trade with the EU to defuse a bitter political dispute with Poland, its trade minister said, while urging the bloc to ban Russian grain imports. https://t.co/1xqiVKNYBe

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据一家智囊团称，在杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）准备发布减税预算之际，英国高收入者的可支配收入将下降 6% 以上。
item.description:
The UK’s higher earners are set for a drop of more than 6% in disposable incomes, according to a think-tank, as Jeremy Hunt prepares to deliver a tax-cutting budget https://t.co/GTKKh5RZaH

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 观点：如果说特朗普时代的美国政治让我们学到了什么，那就是民调机构几乎总是搞错，@SpiegelPeter 写道。这次也不例外
item.description:
Opinion: If there’s anything we’ve learned about US politics in the age of Trump it is that pollsters almost always get it wrong, writes @SpiegelPeter . This time was no different https://t.co/vGnGVJliRJ

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024

item.title: 有迹象表明，参加 "超级星期二 "民主党总统初选的选民正在对乔-拜登总统处理以哈战争的方式投抗议票，因为在一些州，未承诺投票的民主党选民比例相对较高：
item.description:
There were signs that voters in Super Tuesday’s Democratic presidential primaries were casting protest votes against President Joe Biden’s approach to the Israel-Hamas war, as the share of uncommitted Democratic voters was relatively high in some states: https://t.co/UvpL9eI6vm pic.twitter.com/rMRFd7Kmpc

— Financial Times (@FT) March 6, 2024
